free_text.Learning outcomes: To illustrate the most important practical aspects of fermentation processes and subsequent downstream processing unit operations (as seen in Part I)
free_text.Content: 1. Upstream processing (USP)[br/]   - Preparation of bioreactor[br/]   - Inoculation [br/]2. Fermentation[br/]   - Measurement of growth curve[br/]   - Monitoring of fermentation process[br/]3. Downstream processing (DSP)[br/]   - Liquid/solid separation[br/]   - Cell lysis[br/]   - Chromatographic purification[br/]   - Purity assessment[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: The candidates must have pass the exam of the theoretical course " Bioprocesses and downstream processing"
